testcase.name: Select Menu Contract Dispatcher and Select Contract based on type contract Two Wheelers
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Menu "Contract Dispatcher".......................................passed And Select Contract Number based on Type Contract "TWO_WHEELERS"............passed And Click button "Claim"....................................................passed And Varify the mistake detail already match with the matrix Base on Type Contract.passed And Click on Tab "KTP"......................................................passed And Checkbox General Mistake "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP".passed And Choose Dropdown mistake type "Beda RT" from mistake name "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP".passed And Type on textarea note before based on mistake name "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP" with value "TESTING".passed And Type on textarea note after based on mistake name "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP" with value "TESTING after".passed And Click button "Save".....................................................passed And Get text from pop up "IT Supporting Tools" with text "Mistake has been saved".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
